webdev.subtitle: Professional websites, fast and affordable
webdev.intro: We build modern, responsive websites that help businesses establish a strong online presence. From single-page landing sites to multi-page corporate websites, we deliver quality solutions at competitive prices.

features.title: Custom Solutions
features.description: Every website is unique and tailored to your specific business needs.

features.title: Modern, Responsive Design
features.description: Websites that look great on all devices — from mobile phones to desktop computers.

features.title: Fast Turnaround
features.description: From concept to live website in no time, without unnecessary delays.

features.title: SEO Optimization
features.description: Built-in search engine optimization so your clients can find you easily.

features.title: Affordable Pricing
features.description: Transparent pricing with no hidden costs. You know exactly what you're getting.

features.title: Maintenance & Support
features.description: Ongoing support and updates after your website goes live.

packages.name: Starter
packages.description: Single-page or presentation site up to 5 pages

packages.name: Business
packages.description: Multi-page business website up to 15 pages

cta.title: Ready to build your website?
cta.description: Let's discuss your project and find the perfect solution for your business.
